alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Jasper (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 8:52PM CDT until April 04 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County. Embarras River at Ste. Marie affecting Crawford and Jasper Counties. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Ste. Marie. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, County Highway 9 floods between Ste. Marie and Willow Hill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 19.8 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Embarras River Ste. Marie 19.0 15.6 Thu 8 pm CDT 19.6 19.8 19.2 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
